sentences.en: " Is badminton anything like tennis? "" No, as different as chalk from cheese. ”
sentences.cn: “ 羽毛球有点像网球 吗 ? ” “不, 根本不同. ”

sentences.en: a box of coloured chalks
sentences.cn: 一盒彩色粉笔

sentences.en: a piece of chalk
sentences.cn: 一支粉笔

sentences.en: An aquifer is a water - bearing rock stratum such as sandstone and chalk.
sentences.cn: 地下蓄水层是一些有水的岩石层,如沙岩和白垩岩.

sentences.en: As a pitcher, Luther is better than James by a long chalk.
sentences.cn: 作为一名棒球投手, 卢瑟比詹姆斯高明得多.

sentences.en: Chalk and cheese are disparate substances.
sentences.cn: 粉笔和乳酪是完全不同的东西.

sentences.en: chalk cliffs
sentences.cn: 白垩质峭壁

sentences.en: Chalk that up to experience.
sentences.cn: 把那事归于经验问题

sentences.en: chalk up points.
sentences.cn: 得分

sentences.en: He chalked the message on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 他用粉笔把这条消息写在黑板上。

sentences.en: He filched a piece of chalk from the teacher's desk.
sentences.cn: 他从老师的书桌上偷取一支粉笔.

sentences.en: he has chalked up a box office success.
sentences.cn: 他取得了票房成功。

sentences.en: I &B{chalked} my sleeplessness &B{up to} nerves.
sentences.cn: 我把失眠归于神经紧张。

sentences.en: I can't bear the sound of chalk scraping on a blackboard.
sentences.cn: 我受不了粉笔在黑板上摩擦时发出的刺耳声音.

sentences.en: Rub out chalk marks with an eraser.
sentences.cn: 用黑板擦擦掉粉笔字迹.

sentences.en: That amount of money won't be enough, not by a long chalk.
sentences.cn: 那笔金额是差得太远了.

sentences.en: the chalk cliffs of southern England
sentences.cn: 英格兰南部的白垩质峭壁

sentences.en: The chalk jarred against the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 粉笔在黑板上发出吱吱声.

sentences.en: The two places, he insists, are as different as chalk and cheese.
sentences.cn: 他坚持说那两个地方有天壤之别。

sentences.en: We are very aware of our differences, we accept that we are chalk and cheese.
sentences.cn: 我们非常清楚相互之间的差异，并且承认自己是截然不同的两类人。

sentences.en: We shall chalk up his good points.
sentences.cn: 我们将记下他的优点.

sentences.en: With a stick of chalk he wrote her order on a blackboard.
sentences.cn: 他用一截粉笔将她的指示写在黑板上。

sentences.en: writing in chalk on the blackboard
sentences.cn: 黑板上的粉笔字

sentences.en: You can't chalk his bad work up to lack of trying.
sentences.cn: 你不能将他的工作差归因于努力不够.

words.tran_cn: 用粉笔写；用白垩粉擦；记录；规划

phrases.phrase: as different as (或 like) chalk and cheese

phrases.tran_cn: (英)使用黑板板书和老师主讲的传统教学法
有判断力[通常用于否定句]

trans.tran_en: soft white or grey rock formed a long time ago from the shells of small sea animals
to write, mark, or draw something with chalk
